name: Sync Kube-manifests values directly in Spinnaker.txt - Introduction
description: This section introduces a new feature that allows users to directly synchronize the Helm 'values.yaml' file from Kubernetes manifests to Spinnaker, a continuous delivery platform. This enables users to keep their application configurations in sync between Kubernetes and Spinnaker, streamlining the deployment process.
use_cases: Keeping application configurations in sync between Kubernetes manifests and Spinnaker
Streamlining the deployment process by eliminating manual configuration updates
Enabling seamless integration between Kubernetes and Spinnaker for continuous delivery
Reducing the risk of configuration drift and inconsistencies
capabilities: Direct sync of Helm values.yaml file
Integration between Kubernetes manifests and Spinnaker

name: Sync Kube-manifests values directly in Spinnaker.txt - Steps to sync Helm values.yaml from Kube Manifests to Spinnaker
description: This section explains the steps to synchronize the Helm values.yaml file from a Kubernetes Manifests repository to Spinnaker, which is a continuous delivery platform. It involves configuring a pipeline in Spinnaker to fetch the values.yaml file from a GitHub repository and use it as an artifact during the deployment process. This allows for seamless integration between the application's configuration values and the deployment process.
use_cases: Synchronizing application configuration values from a centralized repository to Spinnaker
Automating the deployment process with up-to-date configuration values
Enabling consistent configuration management across different environments (e.g., production, staging)
Facilitating collaboration and version control for application configuration files
capabilities: Bake Manifest stage in Spinnaker pipelines
GitHub integration for fetching configuration files
